question: Some people say that television is useful for education, while others say it is more useful for entertainment. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion
text: Some individuals suggest that television benefits for an educational purpose while others would argue that it has more advantages for relaxation. This essay will argue that although studying through television make learning more attractive, I believe that entertainment should be prioritized.

On the one hand, academic stories taught through television programs are more interesting than those taught by a traditional method. Television programs can provide not only knowledge but also enjoyment at the same time. This is the reason why it attracts more learners to learn from watching this type of media. For example, in Bangkok, children enjoy watching the discovery geography channel in order to increase their scientific information. However, I believe that general societies do not benefit from watching television for learning as much as they do from using it for entertainment.

On the other hand, the time that humans spend watching television is the leisure they choose for taking a break from their studies. As a result, it should focus on relaxing without any relevance to the study. Humans become less tense while watching their favourite TV shows. This can help them have an appropriate work-life balance and have a happier life in the long run. To illustrate, watching more comedy shows is one of the advice that doctors give to their patients in order to overcome their stress. I believe that watching television for entertainment is more worthy than education.

In conclusion, even though television provided an interesting method for studying, it is better to use for relaxing time. Therefore, television plays the most important role in entertaining our society.
